form.name: not_well_attached_to_breast_or_suckling_effectively
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Newborn: Feeding Problems, Low Weight for Age> Not Well Attached to Breast or Suckling Effectively

field.name: Not Well Attached to Breast or Suckling Effectively | Take Action
Teach mother correct positioning and attachment
If baby is not able to attach well immediately, teach mother to express breast milk and feed by cup
Advise mother to give home care for baby
Follow up with mother and her baby in 2 days
